question: Hi guys. Recently my husband has been goingthrough some health issues. But the thing that is really concerning me is his toes and legs. His Nails are turning black, his toes are bleeding and won't heal, his one toe is so bad it has a hole in it, and his leg is swollen 5 times its size. He does not have diabetes. And all his labs are normal.. Any idea What this could be, he doesn't smoke, but drinks quite often. Thanks
title: What could be wrong with husbands leg?
